title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of 

the European Communities (Intra-Community 
Transfers of Defence Related Products) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 346 of 
2011) is amended, in paragraph (1), by the substitution of the following 
definition of ‘Directive’: 

‘Directive’ means Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 6 May 20092 simplifying the terms and conditions of transfers of 
defence-related products within the Community as amended by – 

a) Commission Directive 2010/80/EU of 22 November 20102 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
b) Commission Directive 2012/10/EU of 22 March 20123 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
c) Commission Directive 2012/47/EU of 14 December 20124 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
d) Commission Directive 2014/18/EU of 29 January 20145 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

1 OJ L38, 17.1.2024, p.1 
2 OJ L308, 24.11.2010, p.11 
3 OJ L85, 24.3.2012, p.3 
4 OJ L31, 31.1.2013, p.43 
5 OJ L40, 11.2.2014, p.20 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [188] 3 

f) 

e) Commission Directive 2014/108/EU of 12 December 20146 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
Commission Directive (EU) 2016/970 of 27 May 20167 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
g) Commission Directive (EU) 2017/433 of 7 March 20178 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
h) Commission Directive (EU) 2017/2054 of 8 November 20179 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
Commission Directive (EU) 2019/514 of 14 March 201910 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products. 

i) 

j) 

Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 20 June 201911 adapting a number of legal acts 
providing for the use of the regulatory procedure with scrutiny 
to Articles 290 and 291 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the 
European Union Commission. 

k) Directive (EU) 2021/1047 of 5 March 202112 amending 
Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council as regards the updating of the list of defence-related 
products in line with the updated Common Military List of the 
European Union of 17 February 2020. 

l) 

Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2023/277 of 5 October 
202213 amending Directive 2009/43/EC of 
the European 
Parliament and of the Council as regards the updating of the list 
of defence-related products in line with the updated Common 
Military List of the European Union of 21 February 2022. 

m) Commission Delegated Directive 

(EU) 2024/242 of 27 
September 202314 amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the 
European Parliament and of the Council as regards the updating 
of the list of defence-related products in line with the updated 
Common Military List of the European Union of 20 February

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 3. European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers of Defence
text_raw:
3. European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers of Defence 
Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 268 of 2023) are 
revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 April, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [188] 5

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of 
the Intra Communities Transfer Directive (Directive 
2009/43/EEC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 6 May 2009) is 
to simplify the rules and procedures applicable to the intra-Community transfer 
of defence related products. 

The list of products covered by Directive 2009/43/EEC is the “EU Common 
Military List”. As the common military list is updated regularly, the Directive 
is also updated with an amended list. These Regulations implement and give 
effect to Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2024/242 of 27 September 
2023 to reflect the amendments made in the EU Common Military List. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [188]
